Name: BOT.vinnik Chess: Combination Lessons
About the game: Improve your chess combination knowledge with the help of BOT.vinnik , a soviet digital teacher. ■ Learn the theory behind the strategy ■ 150+ theory backed 'best-move' chess puzzles ■ Combination aspects organized in 19 chapters to elevate your knowledge ■ Made for chess enthusiasts by chess enthusiast ■ Have fun with BOT.vinnik 's peculiar sense of humor!
